Notes

"SP" on the label matrix codes and "SRC" in the runout denotes a [l27576] pressing. Nearly the same as Specialty pressing [r=4214323] but this version does not mention Warner Bros. Music as a publisher on the labels. Recorded at the Townhouse, London and Old Croft, Surrey except strings, recorded at Air Studios Mixed at the Townhouse digitally All songs published by Phil Collins Limited / Pun Music, Inc., ASCAP. On labels: ℗ 1985 Atlantic Records On rear artwork: ℗ © 1985 Atlantic Recording Corporation Printed in U.S.A. Catalog number printed on artwork: 81240-1 Catalog number printed on the spine: 7 81240-1 Catalog number printed on the labels: 81240-1-E Runouts are etched except ' [SRC Logo], MASTERDISK' are stamped.
